title: Sugar Apple Fairytale - Novel Updates
tags: Absent Parents   Adapted to Manga   Artists   Character Growth   Chefs   Cooking   Death of Loved Ones   Different Social Status   Discrimination   Fairies   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Honest Protagonist   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Master-Servant Relationship   Naive Protagonist   Poor Protagonist   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Sculptors   Sharp-tongued Characters   S*aves   Slow Romance
author: Mikawa Miri
description:
In the Kingdom of Highland, a country where fairies are slaves of the humans, Ann Halford, a Candy Craftswoman, decides to purchase one in order to arrive the once-yearly Candy Fair to achieve the title of Silver Sugar Master.

A volume 17 was announced in the volume 16 afterword. The volume will be an 'Epilogue Volume' containing short stories about characters' life after the events in volume 16.>
